TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenReadCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las instancias de esta clase se pasan a métodos.Instances of this class are passed to methods. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la descarga de un recurso para leerlo.The following code example demonstrates downloading a resource for reading. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#30)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#30)] El siguiente método se llama cuando finaliza la descarga.The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#31)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#31)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene una secuencia legible que contiene los datos descargados por un método .

span.span: Gets a readable stream that contains data downloaded by a method.
A that contains the downloaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Debe comprobar la y propiedades antes de usar los datos que devuelven esta propiedad.You should check the and properties before using the data that is returned by this property. Si el valor de propiedad es una objeto o la es el valor de la propiedad `true`, la operación asincrónica no se completó correctamente y la valor de la propiedad no será válido.If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se utiliza la secuencia devuelta por esta propiedad.The following code example uses the stream returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#31)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#31)]
